sentences.sContent: You meet a lot of posers in this job.
sentences.sCn: 做这份工作你会遇到很多装腔作势的人。

synos.tran: 难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事

words.tran: 位置，方位；职位，工作；姿态；站位；vt. 安置；把……放在适当位置
装模作样的人；装腔作势的人
造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论

trans.tranOther: someone who pretends to have a quality or social position they do not really have, usually in order to make people notice or admire them
